text: Arasye ami bani icharaa'ilara paraa angikara laichilo arau sihamtara ocarata bahuto raachula praerana karaichilo. Yetiya'i kono raachule sihamtara ocarata ene kiba lai ahiche yito sihamtara prabrttira biparaita tetiya'i sihamte raachulasakalara karaobara oparata mithyaraopa karaiche arau karaobaka hatya karaiche
